channel.title: Working object ... HELP!

item.title: Working object ... HELP!
item.dc:creator: @games-for-pros games-for-pros
item.description:
@games-for-pros wrote:

You know how to make items like stairs work you need to add the “case ####:” code. I was working on Castle Wars and i could’nt get some of the stairs to work. This is what I wrote and for some reason nothing happend… It worked on other stairs. Please help someone.

THIS IS WHAT I WROTE:

[code]case 4418: // Castle wars Stairs to 3d floor. Zamorak = 2369,3126

            if (absX == 2372 & absY == 3126) {
	    teleportToX = 2369;
                teleportToY = 3127;
                heightLevel = 2;
	}

break;[/code]
i compile… no errors but when i go to that location and i click on stairs nothing happens.
Also maybe im not sure but could it be because the case before it is greater. for example the case before this one is “Case 4470”…
Thnks

Read full topic
